description: Triangle read by rows, giving T(n,k) = number of k-member minimal ordered covers of a labeled n-set (1 <= k <= n).
comments: T(n,k) = A035348(n,k)*k!  The order in which we cover the n-set is considered. - _Geoffrey Critzer_, Jun 28 2013
links: R. J. Clarke, Covering a set by subsets, Discrete Math., 81 (1990), 147-152.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Sum[ (-1)^i*Binomial[k, i]*(2^k - 1 - i)^n, {i, 0, k}]; Flatten[ Join[{1}, Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, 9}, {k, 1, n}]]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 12 2011, after Michael Somos *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Michael Somos_
